HomeWiki:
Project Description

Sample .Net 4.0 application implemented used for developing complex business applications using Domain Driven Design and Agile Practices, the sample is still in initial phase.

You will find initial fictional requirements (User Stories) in Documentation tab.

Feel free to discuss any details of implementation, this is intended to be a community project for elaborating applying domain driven design.

Details of implementation will be described in my blog. 

Note: Many concept implemented in this application are taken from other open source projects like (http://microsoftnlayerapp.codeplex.com).

Technologies & Practices Used

Domain Driven Design (DDD)
Behavior Driven Design (BDD) - Specflow
Test Driven Design (TDD) - NUnit
.Net 4.0
NHibernate
